GSD.description:
KVM: SVM: fix panic on out-of-bounds guest IRQ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 0fb470eb48892e131d10aa3be6915239e65758f3. For more details please see the references link.
